scripts.watch: concurrently -c blue,green -k -n tailwind,hugo "npm run watch --workspace tailwind" "npm run watch --workspace hugo"
scripts.watch:gitpod: concurrently -c blue,green -k -n tailwind,hugo "npm run watch --workspace tailwind" "npm run watch:gitpod --workspace hugo"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build --workspaces
